**PLACE HOLDER FOR NOW**
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
#Takes a long time to run would recommmend only running once  
severity <- read.csv("Severity.csv")
start_time <- read.csv("Start_Time.csv")
end_time <- read.csv("End_Time.csv")
lat <- read.csv("Start_Lat.csv")
long <- read.csv("Start_Lng.csv")
city <- read.csv("City.csv")
county <- read.csv("County.csv")
state <- read.csv("State.csv")
temp <- read.csv("Temperature.csv")
wind <- read.csv("Wind_Speed.csv")
visibilty <- read.csv( "Visibilty.csv")
```

```{r}
#Joins all the data together will add more if we need more columns
#Takes a long time to run would recommmend only running once  
fullData <- severity %>%
  inner_join(start_time) %>%
  inner_join(end_time) %>%
  inner_join(lat) %>%
  inner_join(long) %>%
  inner_join(city) %>%
  inner_join(county) %>%
  inner_join(state) %>%
  inner_join(temp) %>%
  inner_join(wind) %>%
  inner_join(visibilty) %>%
  select(-X) #deletes a column that is row number
```

```{r}
#use a sub set of the data to test things
Iowa <- fullData %>%
  filter(State == "IA")
```
